overview: Hit man Lian Song does his jobs in Taipei then hides out in Okinawa while things cool down, biking to and from a bachelor pad that boasts a refrigerator stocked with a staggering variety of imported beers and bottled water. A natural loner with a romantic bent, Lian is admired by one young woman but instead woos the sad-eyed Yukiko. Yet, Yukiko, like Lian, has a secret history of her own.
title: Starlit High Noon
